Interface SiteItf

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SiteImpl

    public interface SiteItf
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Serveur allows to send and reveive a message from an RMI Object
    Author:
    Emeline SALOMON & Francois DUBIEZ
